column5: He tried to blow up Parliament in the Gunpowder Plot of 1605.
column6: He claimed the island of Hispaniola for the English crown in 1503.
column7: Crowned Edward VIII, he abdicated the throne in 1936 for the love of a woman.
column8: He was one of the most feared pirates of the 17th Century.
column9: He's the leader of the hacker group Anonymous.

column1: A son of the English monarch Edward III, this warrior of the Hundred Years War and heir to the throne died of dysentery at the age of 45 in 1376.
